Name: HeadLight
Notes: Creates a spotlight effect that follows the player character. The radius and the light's color can be configured.

Obj_arg0.Name: Red
Obj_arg0.Description: The red color component. Ranges from 0 to 255 inclusive. Default is 255.

Obj_arg1.Name: Green
Obj_arg1.Description: The green color component. Ranges from 0 to 255 inclusive. Default is 255.

Obj_arg2.Name: Blue
Obj_arg2.Description: The blue color component. Ranges from 0 to 255 inclusive. Default is 255.

Obj_arg3.Name: Alpha
Obj_arg3.Description: The alpha channel component. Ranges from 0 to 255 inclusive. Default is 255.

Obj_arg4.Name: Radius
Obj_arg4.Description: The size of the spotlight. Default is 1000.

SW_APPEAR.Description: Appears when this switch is activated.
